docs.text: Ethan Furman Welcome to my website! I'm a dual-degree BS/MS student at Haverford College and Bryn Mawr College interested in Physics, ML, and Computing. This site contains information about my personal projects, research, and self-guided study in ML, CS, and physics. See notes, problem sets, and code. I'm currently doing research at Bryn Mawr College with the Nanomaterials and Spintronics Group and in associate with the Center for Quantum Materials and Sensing . Feel free to contact me here .
